Function reference

Functions

rasterpic_img()
Convert an image to a geo-tagged raster
asp_ratio()
Compute aspect ratio of an object

Plotting

Functions from other packages from plotting SpatRasters

plotRGB(<SpatRaster>)
Red-Green-Blue plot of a multi-layered SpatRaster (from terra)
geom_spatraster_rgb()
Visualise SpatRaster objects as images (from tidyterra)
tm_raster() tm_rgb() tm_rgba()
Draw a raster (from tmap)
mf_raster()
Plot a raster (from mapsf)
plot_tiles()
Plot map tiles (from maptiles)

About the package

rasterpic rasterpic-package
rasterpic: Create a Spatial Raster from Plain Images
